body_html:
I also hit this issue in 0.11.0rc2, even though I pull the latest source code and build the library.
I think the previous fix [PR #4793 (36ebbf1)] is incomplete. I am able to resolve it by adding the following line at the beginning of sentence_to_token_ids in tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/data_utils.py

sentence = tf.compat.as_bytes(sentence)
body_text:
I also hit this issue in 0.11.0rc2, even though I pull the latest source code and build the library.
I think the previous fix [PR #4793 (36ebbf1)] is incomplete. I am able to resolve it by adding the following line at the beginning of sentence_to_token_ids in tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/data_utils.py
sentence = tf.compat.as_bytes(sentence)
body:
I also hit this issue in 0.11.0rc2, even though I pull the latest source code and build the library. 
I think the previous fix [PR #4793 (36ebbf1)] is incomplete. I am able to resolve it by adding the following line at the beginning of `sentence_to_token_ids` in tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/data_utils.py

  `sentence = tf.compat.as_bytes(sentence)`
